sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Goldenstone Acquisition Ltd. SEC 10-K Report
feed.summary: Goldenstone Acquisition Limited has released its Form 10-K report for the fiscal year ended March 31, 2025, detailing its financial performance and strategic initiatives, including its net income and ongoing merger efforts with Infintium Fuel Cell Systems, Inc. The report highlights the company's business overview as a blank check company, its IPO, and its capital management strategies involving extensions and redemptions. Goldenstone also outlines significant challenges and risks, particularly those related to its ties to China and the evolving regulatory landscape, while emphasizing its future outlook to complete the business combination by June 21, 2025.

feed.title: Goldenstone Acquisition’s Agreement with Infintium Terminated
feed.summary: Goldenstone Acquisition Ltd. (GDST) announced that its Business Combination Agreement with Infintium Fuel Cell Systems, Inc., originally signed in June 2024 and amended in January 2025, has been terminated. Infintium exercised its right to terminate the agreement on October 1, 2025, as the transaction was not completed by the September 30, 2025 deadline.

feed.title: Infintium Fuel Cell Systems $130M SPAC Merger
feed.summary: Infintium Fuel Cell Systems Inc. is proceeding with a blank-check company consolidation deal valued at $130 million, advised by Sichenzia Ross Ference Carmel LLP. The hydrogen fuel cell technology provider will merge with Goldenstone Acquisition Ltd. to form Infintium Fuel Cell Systems Holdings Inc., which is expected to be listed on Nasdaq by the first quarter of 2025. Infintium, founded in 2007, caters to Fortune 500 industrial and automotive companies with its proven hydrogen fuel cell systems.

feed.title: Goldenstone extends merger deadline to June 2025 By Investing.com
feed.summary: Goldenstone Acquisition Ltd. has extended the deadline for completing its initial business combination to June 21, 2025, following stockholder approval. The company will deposit $50,000 into its trust account for each month the deadline is extended, and stockholders also elected five new directors. This extension comes after redemptions leaving approximately $17.87 million in the Trust Account and 3,442,121 shares of public common stock outstanding.
